body: I've had my Logitech M185 (Some cheap non gaming mouse lol) for roughly a year and 3 months, it was fine until yesterday. I suddenly felt a massive change in my sensitivity. I was used to 100% but it suddenly felt like hyper speed I didn't know what was going on. I keep changing my sensitivity and I feel that different sensitivity's feel right at different times. I don't even know if this is possible but I figured the mouse must be auto changing it's DPI. Like I said before I don't know if this is the case but can someone help me change it back/ find the real problem xd.
